mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rvw WHERE rvw_no = #{rvw_no} and rvw_nm = #{rvw_nm}
mapper.select: SELECT B.usr_nm, B.email, C.prd_nm FROm rvw A INNER JOIN usr B ON A.usr_id = B.usr_id INNER JOIN trv_prd C ON A.prd_cd = C.prd_cd;

SELECT A.rvw_ttl, A.rvw_cont, A.wrt_nm, B.mn_img, A.rvw_reg_date, A.rvw_vcnt, A.lk_cnt FROM rvw A INNER JOIN trv_prd B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd INNER JOIN usr C ON A.usr_id = C.usr_id ORDER BY A.rvw_reg_date DESC, A.rvw_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize};

SELECT A.rvw_ttl, A.rvw_cont, A.wrt_nm, B.mn_img, A.rvw_reg_date, A.rvw_vcnt, A.lk_cnt FROM rvw A INNER JOIN trv_prd B ON A.prd_cd = B.prd_cd INNER JOIN usr C ON A.usr_id = C.usr_id ORDER BY A.rvw_reg_date DESC, A.rvw_no DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rvw (rvw_no, rvw_ttl, rvw_cont) VALUES (NULL, #{rvw_ttl}, #{rvw_cont});
